entity.name: Form liên hệ
entity.normal_data_extend: {"locale":{"en":{"tieu_de":"SEND MESSAGE","slogan":"Drop a line, Stay in touch","mo_ta":"Please do not hesitate to contact us by sending a message."}},"normal":{}}

entity.name: Form liên hệ
entity.config:
{"class":"","cache":"1","html_content":"
{if !empty($data_extend['locale'][{LANGUAGE}]['tieu_de'])}

{$this->Block->getLocale('tieu_de', $data_extend)}

{/if} {if !empty($data_extend['locale'][{LANGUAGE}]['slogan'])}
{$this->Block->getLocale('slogan', $data_extend)}
{/if} {if !empty($data_extend['locale'][{LANGUAGE}]['mo_ta'])}
{$this->Block->getLocale('mo_ta', $data_extend)}
{/if}
{assign dich_vus value = $this->Block->getLocale('dich_vus', $data_extend)}
{__d('template', 'start_now')}
"}
entity.normal_data_extend: {"locale":{"en":{"tieu_de":"SEND MESSAGE","slogan":"Drop a line, Stay in touch","mo_ta":"Please do not hesitate to contact us by sending a message."}},"normal":{}}
